name: Spinners vs Aliens ~ Monsters & Fidget Spinner App
name_original: Spinners vs Aliens ~ Monsters & Fidget Spinner App
description:
Best fidget spinner app or game on the AppStore!

Tap the screen with your hand or finger to spin the fidget spinner. Watch out for alien monsters!

If you have fidgety hands, then pick up this free game today. It will keep you occupied just like the real spinners.

"This game is epic!" - said everyone.

Download now and play for FREE!
